text: Stormy Down is a Site of Special Scientific Interest flanking the M4 motorway near Pyle in Bridgend County Borough, South Wales. During World War Two, an aerodrome has been there. ==See also== * List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Mid & South Glamorgan * RAF Stormy Down == References == Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Bridgend County Borough
title: Stormy Down
